title: OOHTML-CLI
desc: A command-line tool for OOHTML-based UI development. Hand-author your UI in absolute free-form mode, with a powerful build tool as coauthor.

features.title: HTML Modules Bundling
features.desc: Automatically translate disparate HTML from the filesystem into HTML modules.

features.title: HTML-to-CSS Aggregation
features.desc: Get your CSS automatically generated from your HTML classes. The flipped approach!

features.title: Subscript-to-WC Compilation
features.desc: Get automatically-generated Web Components from your freeform HTML Subscript logic.

features.title: A Powerful Plugin System!
features.desc: Extend the capabilites with just anything that makes OOHTML-CLI the UI coauthor for you.
